items.name: Another Shadow
items.desc:
Another Shadow – Berliner Weisse with Kiwi, Lime, Pear and Honey Melon
Range: Augment
Style: Quadruple Fruited Berliner Weisse
ABV: 4.2%
We make no secret of how much our head brewer Lally has expanded our range as a brewery. From his days creating some of the most well regarded classics over at Mad Hatter, we’ve handed the wheel fully over to our resident sour beer chief to create Another Shadow.
A beer with one eye on those amazing triple fruited gose series of beers brewed by our pals up at North, but with a signature Polly’s stamp all over it, we’ve absolutely loaded this beer to the nines with kiwi, lime, pear and honey melon to create a massively fruit-forward Berliner with enough sourness to keep everything in check. Say it with us now! Quadruple! Fruited! Sour!

items.name: DDH Oh My…
items.desc:
DDH Oh My…
Range: Augment
Style: Double India Pale Ale
ABV: 8.5%
The original version of Oh My… turned out to have something in the way of a cult following when we released it back in April. Our collaboration with Chamonix-based Big Mountain Brewing Co utilised everybody’s favourite hype hop Sabro for the first time and set off an obsession which continues to this day, thanks to those super complex coconut, pina colada flavours, paired up with our old faithful Citra for some citrus balance. Fast forward to the present day, with a tonne of both Sabro and Citra in our cold store, and with the blessing of our French pals, we decided to scale up Oh My… with the Polly’s DIPA treatment. An insane dry hop charge of 50kg means those juicy pina colada notes are amplified to the max for a DIPA that drinks well below its ABV.

items.name: Ghost Voices
items.desc:
Ghost Voices
Range: Augment
Style: Single-Hopped Simcoe DIPA
ABV: 8.2%
The best things really do happen in trilogies – Star Wars, The Godfather, Back to the Future; we could go on. We’ve gone there with Mosaic, we’ve gone there with Citra, and now it’s the turn of probably the biggest in-house favourite hop varietal here at Polly’s; Simcoe. Ghost Voices is the final entry of our exploration into single hopped DIPAs fermented out with everybody’s new favourite super-yeast, Kveik. Tangerines and candied oranges on the nose, follow up with a full, thick, pulpy mouthfeel; bursting with all those incredible passionfruit, mango and berry flavours, whilst retaining just a little bit of earthy bitterness to keep everything in line.

items.name: Reality Dysfunction
items.desc:
Reality Dysfunction
Range: Augment
Style: Double Dry-Hopped Pale Ale w/Lactose
ABV: 5.5%
Our staff designed DDH Pale series is certainly gaining some serious traction now, and we’re rolling onto another one in rapid time before we take a short break, with the arrival of Reality Dysfunction – designed entirely by our assistant brewer Matt.
Expressing his love for our lactose-tinged output, Matt brought the mash temperature right down to ensure the beer wasn’t overly sweet, and hit the dry hop up with a bumper dry hop charge of Enigma for a symphony of flavours that dance throughout.
Expect intense amounts of raspberries, passionfruit, and just a smattering of herbal complexity, complimented by the sweetness and full body brought to the table by the lactose addition in the boil. Bravo Matt!

items.name: Sunshine Type
items.desc:
Sunshine Type
Range: Augment
Style: India Pale Ale
ABV: 6.0%
Sometimes it’s just best to go with the classics – a 6% IPA? Sure, let’s go for it. Simple three hop bill of Amarillo, Citra and Mosaic? Get it on the gyle sheet. Ferment out with LA3? Crop that yeast and get it in there! Sunshine Type is our tribute to (possibly the weirdest) summer here at Polly’s. As the nights start drawing in again, we’re all about reminiscing about those hazy days, where the best thing to do is to just go with what comes naturally to us as brewers. As textbook Polly’s as we can get, Sunshine Type is absolutely glowing with a serious amount of bright, juicy, tropical notes, with maximum body and yeast suspension from our in-house LA3 strain.
